audioText: Le pape confirme le célibat sacerdotal. Comment le pape Léon XIV entend relever le défi de la crise des vocations chez les jeunes catholiques
question: What does the speaker say Pope Leo XIV is addressing?
options: The challenge of modernizing Catholic liturgy
The crisis of religious vocations among young Catholics
The problem of declining church attendance
The issue of financial difficulties in parishes
explanation: The text states 'Comment le pape Léon XIV entend relever le défi de la crise des vocations chez les jeunes catholiques' - How Pope Leo XIV intends to meet the challenge of the vocations crisis among young Catholics. The distractors test misinterpretation of the challenge (modernizing liturgy, declining church attendance, financial difficulties).
